name: Kogasa's Conundrum
description:
Join Kogasa to find out her past! This is a game using RPGmaker MV for Touhou Fanjam 5. Kogasa's Conundrum is a short 20ish minute RPG that was made all in 3 days. Almost all assets within the game are made by myself, Vistram (Twitter), excluding some SFX and Battle Animations that are stock with RPGmaker MV.

Thanks for playing! I hope you enjoy!

Characters and world created by ZUN and Team Project Alice.
